name: sonashow
description: SonaShow is a self-hosted dashboard for displaying Now Playing information from media servers like Jellyfin or Kodi on big screens, ideal for party or ambient displays.

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Shows currently playing media from Jellyfin or Kodi

features.title: Full
features.description: Displays media information in full-screen for big screens

features.title: Album Artwork
features.description: Shows high-resolution cover art for music and movies

features.title: Metadata Display
features.description: Presents title, artist, album, and other media details

features.title: Auto
features.description: Updates display automatically when media changes

features.title: Multiple Sources
features.description: Connects to various media server types

features.title: Screensaver Mode
features.description: Activates when no media is playing
